values: ATTENTIONNNNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Birthday is March 22nd, what the fuck are you getting me? :D
If you didn't get my message the first time, my new journal is

I went to the hardcore show last nite in Michigan City. Fucking great. My leg still hurts though. They had some pretty good bands there, and September 13th, Clark and Blood in Blood out will be playing in South Bend. I hafta go <3. SOOOOO EVERYONE AROUND THERE SHOULD GO. I should have brought my camera. :/ I would have gotten picturesssss. Then we went to Denny's later on that nite.. Wayne and I made a pancake vagina... We almost got kicked out... yet again, because there was this stupid new bitch waitress there. Anyways, that's all for now. :D

OKAYYYYY. so. I wanna new journal cuz this whole "cchesterr_04" name is just suckass.. so if anyone has an lj code they wanna give away, message me? :/ -> xcerealwars <- aim. School starts in like 8 hours.. >:/ oh well... hmm.. someone bake me some kick ass cookies. i need a new layout too. this one was total accident. i might work on one now..sooooo ill post more later.

SO ITS BEEN A FUGGING WHILEEEEE... I wanna go to a mest concert near > Chicago. South Bend. Indianapolis. < anywhere around there. If you have tickets and are willing to give me one, I will sex you. OR. any of the following bands. MSI, Goldfinger, AFI, Audioslave, System of a Down, Dropkick Murphys, etc. Anyways. this past weekend, I went to Ohio. I saw Stephanie while I was there and stayed at her house for about 4 days. It was pretty cool, we went to the biggest thrift store EVER. I bought a bunch of spiffy shirts. We did a bunch of other nifty things. AHEMMMMM >>>> IF ANYONE FINDS SOMETHING WITH SKULLS OR STARS ON IT, SEND IT TO ME. FED EX MOTHER TRUCKER. THANKS <<<< School starts back up Monday. My sea monkeys are huge, they're about quarter inch. Anyway... I'll have more later.

K time for update. I gotta new digital camera... it kicks ass. I took a picture of my car. so it'll be up here soon. I went to sheris party, it was pretty cool :D. LaPorte County Fair is going on this week.. everyone should come to indiana and go to it. Just cuz i said. Im eating fruit loops. AAAAAND ill change my lj layout soon... when im not so lazy. -
I updated my website for the first time in like a year :/ sooooooo go there // SIGN GUESTBOOK \\. that is all 8)

This is really odd, i went to nikkis house today for the fourth of july. we played volleyball, and a bunch of other games. she seemed really happy. she made plans for the new few weeks so this is what really got me,, she got to her friends house, and from there she told me she wanted to talk to me at her house on sunday because she cant talk about it over the phone. so as you can guess what it is.. she left me.. i hope not for good :/ danielle (friend shes staying at) and she told jeff that she started drinking which she never does, and now apparently shes toast. :/// shes still bawling. and i dont know what to think anymore... 3 months.. i thought it was going to go for years and years :/ so... i guess ill update when jeff calls me back and tell me whats happening with nikki....

Worst thing about Poner is __________. Best thing about Poner is __________. I am __________ with Poner.

Okay... i wake up and my heart is pounding out of my chest... literally.. so i go to the doctor and they dont know whats wrong with it.. they tell me to go to the hospital and get a heart monitor, so i have an appointment for monday to get one of those.. they take my blood to see if theres anything wrong with that.. so after my heart pounds of out my chest about an inch and a half, i come home and find out my sister was in a car wreck, and her car was totalled/impounded. shes okay, but she hurt her sternum on the steering wheel. she had no license or insurance so now shes in big shat :/ it wasnt her fault thou because the guy didnt have his turn signal on, good thing she has witnesses. well.. im in pain :D so im going to lay down :/

<b><font color="#000000">okii.. for our three months i made her dinner... i made shrimp [with parsley], steak, [the filet minjonernen stuff] gourmet salad, angel food cake with all kindsa berries, etc.... werd... it kicked ass.. we had wine and she was trippin.. it was good stuff too :D  green melon ball... anyways.. she got me sea monkeys.. ima kill em :/ im gonna over feed em and they'll get fat and eat me... im drinking smirnoff :/ yah the GIRLS PUSSY DRINNK.. stfu... fag.. umm... anyways... thats it :D  werd.. </font><b>

holy hell this is one of my new favoritist songs ever. -current music-. anyway.. tomorrow i go to get my ping pong table, foos ball table, trampoline, and air hockey table. :D this makes a happy poner.. that is all.

Mypenis ate my homework. 

Sorry I'm late. I was playing with Mypenis. 

I'm sorry, Officer. I didn't realize I had to keep Mypenis on a leash. 

I love giving Mypenis a bath. 

Mypenis needs to get more exercise. He weighs over fifty pounds. 

Playing with Mypenis really wears me out. 

Would you like to see a picture of Mypenis? 

I keep a picture of Mypenis in my wallet. 

Help! I can't find Mypenis! 

Sorry to be driving so slow, officer, but I was looking for Mypenis. 

Mypenis gets excited whenever the mailman comes. 

Oh. no! Something bit Mypenis! 

Watch it or you'll step on Mypenis. 

When Mypenis behaves well, he gets a bone. 

Sorry I'm late, but Mypenis kept me up howling all night...
